content.rendered:
Medusa Equip are pleased to promote Aten Ltd as our newest distributor, covering the Greece region.

Nicolas Tsilakis and his expert hydraulic sales and engineering team have been servicing the region for many years including the supply of Medusa Equip highly regarded LightWeight HPU’s for bolt tensioning applications. We look forward to supporting Aten Ltd and our end users in Greece for the supply and use of all our High Pressure Liquid and Gas Standard Product and Engineered System ranges.

Nicolas can be contacted directly

Otherwise please visit our Distributor page for further contact details.
